page.title: 19BROADFORD POLICE STATION
page.content: There are two permanent policemen in the{Broadford Police Station},one constable and a sergeant.There are no policewomen or dogs and only one police car.Each policeman spends about 3_5 years there,before they are moved on to another place.A policeman has to do lots of different things here unlike some other places.Also,they have more involvement with the local people and offences are more likely to be dealt with on a local basis.When they arrest someone,that person is taken to{Portree},where he will be dealt with.The local police get involved in everything from,road accidents,mountain rescues,sudden deaths,fires,minor thefts,break-ins drownings,firearms,licensing hours & ensuring that sheep are dipped to instructing schoolchildren in Cycling Proficiency.
